availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Boone Marshall (Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Father of Beverly Marshall. Merchant in Kenton County in 1850. Retired merchant in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington/Ward 3, p. 249B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington/Ward 3, p. 618.
"George Boone Marshall (1798-1870)," Find A Grave, Memorial #86399612, accessed July 3, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86399612/george-boone-marshall.
